Title: Adiwiraku
Writer: Jason Chong, Cheryl Ann Fernando, Eric Ong
Actors: Sangeeta Krishnasamy, Xavier Fong, Ahmad Adnin Zidane Muslim, Nur Irdina Tasnim Ishak
Plot: Adiwiraku is based on a true story teacher Cheryl Ann Fernando and her struggles and successes in teaching in a rural school in Kedah. Shot entirely in Sungai Petani, Adiwiraku brings to ...
